name: The Magical Exchange DEMO
description:
In this short demo , you'll help a magical girl named Tulip, escape from an obssesed fan who has trapped her in a strange builiding.

Controls:

- "Z" on your keyboard or "A" in your controller to interact/attack.

- "Arrow Keys" or "Left Analog" to move.

(Note: You have to use the mouse on the main menu)

Twitter: Yume
